document_data.name: Bloodril's Snug Haven
document_data.mainbody: '''Bloodril's Snug Haven''' was an inn located in the town of [[Bryn Shander]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one of the oldest establishments within the town's walls.
document_data.Structure: Like many of Bryn Shander's inns, the Snug Haven was poorly constructed. It stood high above ground level, which offered little protection from icy winds and freezing temperatures.
document_data.Atmosphere: The poor construction of the ironically named ''Snug Haven'' left guests of the inn cold and shivering.
